name: postprandial_t2d

DataInput._comment: ----------Model variables----------
Rate of glucose intake from food digestion, mM min^{-1}
Basal plasma glucose concentration above which the cells initiate to produce new insulin, mM
Plasma glucose concentration, mM
Excess plasma glucose concentration compared with the basal concentration, mM
Provision of new insulin to the beta-cells, pM min^{-1}
Pancreatic insulin secretion rate , pM min^{-1}
Plasma insulin concentration, pM
Basal pancreatic insulin secretion rate, pM min^{-1}
----------Model parameters----------
Delay between the glucose signal and insulin secretion, min^{-1}
Pancreatic responsivity to glucose, pM min^{-1} mM^{-1}
Transfer rate between portal vein and liver, min^{-1}
Coefficient for insulin reducing glucose concentration, min^{-1}
Coefficient for glucose reducing glucose concentration, min^{-1}
Coefficient for elevated glucose reducing glucose concentration, -
Coefficient for insulin secretion accounting for the insulin degradation, -
Pancreatic responsivity to the glucose rate of change, pmol L^{-1} mM^{-1}
----------Parameters for the model inferences----------
Time step, min
Scale for the minimum covariance in the model
Time slices to sample

_comment: Rate of glucose intake from food digestion, mM/min
